name: After Hours (itch) (Blaze Unicycle)
description:
After Hours is a top down, speedrun, puzzle game. In this game, you play as Boomba, a little floor cleaning robot that has to clean the floors in the office after everyone leaves. When everyone is gone, the floor becomes unstable and falls into the void when Boomba drives over it.

Made for the Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam

Controls:

WASD: movement

R: restart

E: ??? (it's a surprise)

Credits:

Caleb Knoth

Matthew Milostan

Brennar Schopp

Charlotte Raft
